mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT timestmp,formatted_message,logger_name,level_string,thread_name,reference_flag,arg0,arg1,arg2,arg3,caller_filename,caller_class,caller_method,caller_line,event_id, max(case mapped_key when 'HOSTNAME' then mapped_value else 0 end) as 'hostname', max(case mapped_key when 'OPERATORIP' then mapped_value else 0 end) as 'operatorip', max(case mapped_key when 'ACCOUNT' then mapped_value else 0 end) as 'account' FROM ( SELECT le.*,lep.mapped_key,lep.mapped_value FROM dms.logging_event le LEFT JOIN dms.logging_event_property lep ON le.event_id=lep.event_id ) tt GROUP BY timestmp,formatted_message,logger_name,level_string,thread_name,reference_flag,arg0,arg1,arg2,arg3,caller_filename,caller_class,caller_method,caller_line,event_id ) t
